name: RunRepeat.com Rating Solution
author: RunRepeat.com

sections.description:
RunRepeat.com is a review aggregator of running shoe reviews. We are 100% independent, and do not review running shoes ourselves.

Runners visit the website to read reviews, write their own reviews, check ranking lists and to compare current/new running shoes with similar models. This plugin allows you to add our reviews of running shoes to your pages. Simply install the plugin and insert the shortcode [runrepeatratings] to the pages where you want to display reviews.

How it works:

  • Insert the standard shortcode [runrepeatratings]
  • The plugin automatically detect what product is displayed
  • Ratings from RunRepeat is inserted automatically

Learn more about the benefits of this by visiting our B2B page, where you will find detailed documentation on the effect of inserting our reviews to your pages.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  • Visit “Plugins > Add New“
  • Search for “RunRepeat.com Rating Solution“
  • Activate RunRepeat.com Rating Solution from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  • Download RunRepeat.com Rating Solution.
  • Upload the “runrepeatcom-rating-solution” directory to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  • Activate RunRepeat.com Rating Solution from your Plugins page.

Once Activated

Go to Tools > RunRepeat Solutions and here you can find more info about how to use the shortcode

short_description: RunRepeat.com is a review aggregator of running shoes. This plugin allows you to add our reviews to your product pages or review pages.
